title: Hot tuna, Greek feta & potato salad

ingredients.item: 350g essential Waitrose Potatoes, cut into 2cm chunks
1 green pepper, deseeded and thinly sliced
200g can essential Waitrose Tuna Steak In Olive Oil
50g essential Waitrose Pitted Black Olives, roughly chopped
¼ x 28g pack fresh coriander, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Cook the potatoes in boiling water for about 10 minutes until tender. Preheat the grill to high. Scatter the onion and green pepper into a shallow roasting tin and sprinkle with the oregano. Grill for 5 minutes.

Drain the can of tuna, reserving the oil. Roughly flake the fish. Stir the lemon juice and plenty of black pepper into the oil to make a dressing. Add the tuna, tomatoes and olives to the roasting tin. Place the feta on top and grill for a further 5 minutes or until the feta starts to colour.
Drain the potatoes and turn onto serving plates. Stir the coriander into the hot salad and spoon on top. Drizzle with the olive oil dressing to serve.
